name: clean-node-api
description: git config --global core.editor code git config --global --edit [user] 	email = lowinho@yahoo.com.br 	name = CÃ©sar Lowe [core] 	editor = code --wait [alias] 	s = !git status -s 	c = !git add --all && git commit -m 	l = !git log --pretty=format:'%C(blue)%h%C(red)%d%C(white) %s - %C(cyan)%cn, %C(green)%cr'
